person.persName: Nelson Trusler (Connersville, Indiana, attorney and soldier)

body.p: Connersville, Indiana, attorney and soldier. Indiana native. Married to Salome Stanton Trusler c1847. Father of Preston Trusler, Mary S. Trusler, Edna H. Trusler, and Pinckney G. Trusler. Married to Elizabeth Trusler c1864. Attorney in Connersville in 1850. Attorney in Connersville in 1860. Served in the 84th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel in 1862.
